DE LUCA Cosimo Damiano, Literary and Subliterary Papyri from Philadelphia in Cairo Museum.
Mamdouh ELDAMATY and Mai TRAD (Edd.), Egyptian Museum Collections around the World. Studies for the Centennial of the Egyptian Museum, Cairo. Volume I (Cairo, 2002) pp. 259-267, 1 pl.
